channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
i started my server and its online and i can log in AND MY ip works and everything but nobody else can login to my server... only i am able to do this
i think its weird i can log in on like 3 computers but whenever anyone else tried to log in they cant it says error connecting to server
what might be the problem reps for any help that works

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Believe Believe
item.description:
@Believe wrote:

[quote=“anc13nts1, post:2, topic:234599”]First portfoward. Ports 43594. Or w.e one you want.

You can log on your server with the other 3 computers probably because they are the same ip adress. (as in your house)[/quote]
Either that or he’s running the server on each computer.
And, allowing him to connect with localhost.

Read full topic
